title: Istituto Marangoni Showcases Student Fashion Designs in Miami's Design District
description: Miami may not be seen as an official fashion hub like New York or even Los Angeles,  but colleges like Istituto Marangoni Miami (part of the Milan-based Istituto Marangoni network) are challenging that narrative, training the next generation of fashion talent who are just as ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
